column2: Ay, getting real chummy with these fellas, they seem like thugs.  I bet they could do the thug shaker, the rump shaker even.  Man I wanna see them shake that shit.
These guys seem soooo chill.  We need to link up!!!!!!
Long have we waited for this day to come.  The integrationn of the peruvian lands will lead to great economic possibilities for the Plurinationalist State of Bolivia, or should we say, Bolivia-Peru.

The exquisite economic possibilities of the Atacama Desert will enrich the Plurinationalist State of Bolivia-Peru's treasury.  State mandated quickie sex will increase our population growth of the area, and the newly born children will be sent straight to the mines for economic growth.  Jobs will be created from more mining, transportation of goods, and mine collapse rescue operations.  GLORY TO BOLIVIA-PERU!!!!!
Quito is the city of the worlds desires, and the Ecuadorians have had it too long, we deserve to own such a wonderful city!
Chile has been a thron in our side since day one.  Coast stealing pieces of shits have had this coming for a long team.  EAT MY DICK YOU COCKSUCKAS
Due to Morales ascending to Lichdom, Bolivia can now spread its influence throughout all of South America to gain what Morales views as its natural borders
Brazil is a bitch ass motherfucker.  Run by idiots who are against Bolivian domination.  They must be raped and pillaged, its only reasonable.
Yknow, Simon Bolivar was a chill ass dude.  We LITERALLY named our country after him.  His people are aight with me.
Lionel Messi is a GOAT.  Gotta give citizenship to his people as a form of respect.
Look, we may hate these guys, but Pele is a straight up goat. . . SO WE MUST RESPECT HIM!!!!!
Just seems like something we should have.
This will go along nicely with the 10 gigabyte of France nerfs.
Offer to Buy the Falkland Islands
STINKY BRITISH PEOPLE, GIVE ISLANDS GIVE ISLAND GIVE ISLANDS GIVE ISLANDS NOOOOOOOOOOW!!!!!

We've done it.  Bolivia has united South America.  Evo Morales has lead his nation to greatness.  His only words to say to his people are this,  "I wouldn't have gotten here if I hadn't prayed to lord Josh."  That shit sent chills down my spine. . . READ THAT AGAIN!

The Archmage Elon Musk had challenged Evo Morales fully aware of his intent to ascend to lichdom. The battle lasted 5 long months, until at the end, Elon had been left on the ground broken, beat, and scarred. Morales sat back on his throne of Lithium at Lake Titicaca, and proclaimed himself Lich King.  "Hey Elon, wanna hear a joke?" Said Morales. "Yeah. . . sure" "Lithium" "I. . . don't get it" "Thats right you son of a bitch!" Then everyone clapped (LITERALLY)
